name: The Bard's Tale (itch)
description:
Welcome to The Bards Tale, a story of a mighty prince, Matis, seeking to marry a princess and unite two major powers under a commonwealth: The Rudawa and Arcadia Kingdoms! Everything is fine until a sorceress puts him in a time loop a day before his wedding, hoping he will perish, breaking the bond. Can you help Matis escape his fate and restore order to the medieval kingdoms of Rudawa and Arcadia?

In this game you have a time limit to complete the story or the day is reset. You will get reset a couple of times which is absolutely normal as the game relies on you remembering how to perform tasks, in order to complete it faster. That is how I implemented the theme anyways.

Good luck!

IMPORTANT

This game was made for the Ludum Dare 47 Compo challenge. The theme was "Stuck in a loop".

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/the-bards-tale

Due to this being made in under 2 days there are probably bugs and improvements that can be made. Please be sure to let me know in the comments section so that I can update this game once the Ludum Dare Compo is finished.

BUG LOG

Will update once bug reports come in!

VERSIONS

Downloadable available - web build coming soon!
